name: HSC RED BOOT BADGE for the Semi-Finalists 2022

metadata.name: HSC RED BOOT BADGE for the Semi-Finalists 2022
metadata.description: This HYPER RED BOOT BADGE is awarded to the eligible holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 in celebration of Semi-Finalists of the QATAR 2022 FIFA World Cup: Croatia, Argentina, Morocco, France.
metadata.criteria: The badge is automatically awarded to the holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) with country property of Croatia, Argentina, Morocco and France at the time of the last game of 2022 FIFA World Cup Quarter Finals.
metadata.evidence: The winner has been proved to be the holder of eligible Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) at the time of the last game of 2022 FIFA World Cup Quarter Finals: Croatia, Argentina, Morocco or France.
